fields.text: Creates magical bolts of ice that damage and slow your enemies.
Synergies: Frost Nova, Abominable, Frozen Orb
Increases your defense and freezes enemies that hit you.

Creates a magical ice comet
that freezes or kills nearby enemies
Synergies: Ice Bolt, Abominable, Blizzard, Frozen Orb

Summon a beast from the frozen wilderness to 
aide you against the forces of evil.
Increases your defense freezes and damages enemies that hit you.
Creates a magical globe that sprays a torrent of ice bolts to lay waste to your enemies.
Summons massive shards of ice to destroy your enemies.
Synergies: Ice Bolt, Abominable, Glacial Spike
Increases defense and discharges an ice bolt in retaliation against ranged attackers.
Released a dark, electrically charged cloud towards your enemies.
uses the power of your mind to pick up items, use objects, and knock back enemies.
Reverse the ions within yourself. Channel your resist into destructive power.
Creates a powerful Lightning Bolt to lay waste to your enemies.
Synergies: Rolling Thunder, Nova, Chain Lightning
Creates a field of deadly sparks. Reduce enemies HP by 25% per Cast.
Discharge all stored electrical energy stunning and knocking back your foes. Be careful though as you will need to recharge!
Creates a bolt of lightning that arcs through several targets.

Creates an expanding ring of lightning
to shock and stun nearby enemies.
Creates a magical shield that consumes mana instead of health when you take damage.
Unleash fiery chaos to burn your enemies.
Enchants melee or ranged weapons with fire.
Increases the rate at which you recover mana and your cast speed for a short time.
Enchants an arrow or bolt that explodes on contact, damaging all nearby enemies, Always hits.
Gain increased movement speed  and create a wall of fire in your wake to scorch your enemies.
Creates a wall of flame that burns nearby enemies.
Summons a meteor from the heavens to crush and incinerate your Enemies.
Summons a multi-headed beast of flame to reduce your enemies to ashes.
Burst forth with flaming energy, englufing enemies all around.
